summary: **Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas** is a popular video game from 2004. You play as Carl "CJ" Johnson, who goes back home after his mom's death and tries to rebuild his old gang. The game is set in a made-up state called San Andreas, inspired by real places like Los Angeles and San Francisco. It received lots of praise for its story, open world, and graphics, but also caused some controversy. It sold over 27.5 million copies and is considered one of the best games ever made.
title: Grand Theft Auto San Andreas
